alert.note: Alert for De Witt (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 6:23PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central De Witt County through 700 PM CDT... At 623 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clinton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clinton, Wapella, Weldon, De Witt, Weldon Springs State Park, Lane and Clinton Lake Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for central Illinois.
